The OtherMolecules class
================================

Using the OtherMolecules functions
----------------------------------

The functions within OtherMolecules allow the Molecule class to interact with
other Molecules objects. The major functions are to compare coordinate sets
and add other molecules.

Function Definitions
--------------------

.. automodule:: scoria_mda.OtherMolecules
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
